entry.title: Demumu: Are You Dead?
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 8.99 â†’ USDÂ 4.99 [USDÂ 0.99 ~ USDÂ 8.99]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 4.99

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

A lightweight safety tool crafted for solo dwellers, establishing invisible safety protection through check-in monitoring and emergency contact mechanisms to make solitary life more reassuring Â· Automatic Notification for Unchecked-In Days Â· Set up one emergency contact (family member or friend) in advance. If you havenâ€™t checked in via the app for consecutive days, the system will automatically send an email to them the next day to promptly convey safety anomalies and gain critical intervention time for potential risks Â· Effortless Setup & Use Â· No registration or login required. Simply enter the contactâ€™s name and email to complete setup on first use. Tap to check in daily, with the background automatically monitoring your status without disturbing daily routines to ensure easy and convenient operation Â· Strict Privacy Protection Â· Uses encryption technology to safeguard emergency contact information and check-in records. Refuses to collect irrelevant permissions like location, eliminating privacy leakage risks and ensuring personal information security for trustworthy safety guardianship Â· For All Solo Dwellers Â· Whether youâ€™re a solo office worker, a student living away from home, or anyone choosing a solitary lifestyle, Demumu serves as your safety companion: daily check-ins signal safety, while abnormal situations trigger early notifications to give those who care about you peace of mind and add a layer of protection for yourself Alone but not lonely, safety by your side. Protect every solitary moment with simple solutions and build a solid safety line for solo living User Agreement: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/UserAgreement.html Privacy Policy: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/PrivacyPolicy.html Official Email: Demumuofficial@nexun.vip Demumu Team

åº”ç”¨æˆªå±

iPhone

iPad

  • Lisa characterï¼šUSDÂ 0.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

You wake up in an unknown place and the last thing you remember is being kidnapped. But something has happened in that strange place, something out of the ordinary ... something dangerous. You must discover the way to escape. Because here, you will only find death. -Explore a large dark area: secret buildings, a creepy hospital and mysterious laboratories. -Solve puzzles and search, collect and use objects to escape from the place. -Escape with your friends in online multiplayer mode! (Alpha) INCLUDES: -New map: Forest -Create unlimited private multiplayer rooms -No ads

entry.title: Black Border 2
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 1.49 â†’ USDÂ 0.99 [USDÂ 0.49 ~ USDÂ 1.49]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 0.99

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Inspect papers, prevent smugglingâ€”keep the border safe or profit from corruption. Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game. Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants. Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy. Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets. Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country. NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer. Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience. Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully. Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband. Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty. Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband. Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security? Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

åº”ç”¨æˆªå±

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: SmallFish Chess for Stockfish
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 4.99 â†’ å…è²» [å…è²» ~ USDÂ 4.99]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šå…è²»

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store. SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking. SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised. Features --------- - Blunder checking - Multiple line analysis - Graphical evaluation of your game - Game previews - Dark mode support - Endgame tablebase - Opening books Why not just download and try it yourself?

entry.summary: Notepad Pro+ Advanced Tools: USDÂ 9.99 â†’ USDÂ 4.99
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯

App å…§è³¼è²·

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 1.99

App å…§è³¼è²·

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼šUSDÂ 4.99

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Todayâ€™s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization â€¢ Unlimited notes storage â€¢ Multiple note colors â€¢ Pinned & private notes â€¢ Custom font styles & font sizes â€¢ Sort notes by name or date â€¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time â€¢ Easy note sharing â€¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security â€¢ App lock with multiple passcode options â€¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync â€¢ iCloud sync for notes â€¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications â€¢ Widget for todayâ€™s notes â€¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager â€¢ Create and manage PDF files â€¢ Edit existing PDFs â€¢ Export notes as PDF â€¢ Share PDFs easily â€¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs â€¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. Weâ€™re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 2.99 â†’ USDÂ 1.49 [USDÂ 0.39 ~ USDÂ 2.99]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 1.49

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

åº”ç”¨æˆªå±

iPhone

iPad
